title: Fantasy Week: Rookie RB busts, Outliers, Listener Questions with Heath Cummings (Football 8/27)
description:
Will Brinson welcomes Pick Six regular Heath Cummings for fantasy chatter just 2 weeks out from the kickoff of the 2020 regular season. First, the guys discuss a new podcast from the FFT crew called Fantasy Football Today in 5 (download and subscribe now!). Will and Heath then hit on David Montgomery's injury and how that impacts the Bears offense from a fantasy perspective (4:30). It's been a long offseason, so Heath has surely fired off some takes that we need to catch up on (15:00). Spoiler: don't set expectations too high for rookie running backs. Then, we get into the players he likes way more than consensus rankings (30:00). Finally the duo answers questions from Pick Six listeners regarding the upcoming fantasy season (46:00). Oh yeah, it wouldn't be a podcast with these two without some beer talk at the end!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @heathcummingssr
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
